name: GND Protocol
description: What is the project about? GND Protocol is the mother protocol of $gmUSD, a Yield-Bearing, Fully-Backed Stablecoin built on top of Uniswap V3's liquidity engine and farm. We effectively employ Gain Protocol's $gDAI and GMD Protocol's $gmdUSDC, and GND FARM, a powerful yield-generating resource. What makes your project unique? We are built on top of Uniswap V3 liquidity engine, and help simplify and harness it's potential for investors. History of your project. We have launched for 24 hours and have attracted over 7m TVL. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We will continue to and set ranges for liquidity, continuing to generate fees for investors. What can your token be used for? GND can be locked into xGND, and the token is staked to allow users to earn fees from concentrated liquidity.
